error.discovery_failed: Failed to discover Sunricher DALI gateways on the network
error.no_devices_found: No Sunricher DALI gateways found on the network

data_description.selected_gateway: Each option shows the gateway name, serial number, and IP address.

user.description:
**Three-step process:**

1. Ensure the gateway is powered and on the same network.
2. Select **Submit** to start discovery (searches for up to 3 minutes)
3. While discovery is in progress, press the **Reset** button on your Sunricher DALI gateway device **once**.

The gateway will respond immediately after the button press.
